Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

H3DPOBJECT

The basic type H3DPOBJECT is a generic handle to 3D digital audio sample, a 3D listener object, or over 3D object.

Discussion

H3DPOBJECT handles are returned from the AIL_allocate_3D_sample_handle, AIL_open_3D_listener, and AIL_open_3D_object functions.


Group: Basic Types
Related Functions: AIL_3D_orientation, AIL_3D_position, AIL_3D_user_data, AIL_3D_velocity, AIL_allocate_3D_sample_handle, AIL_auto_update_3D_position, AIL_close_3D_listener, AIL_close_3D_object, AIL_open_3D_listener, AIL_open_3D_object, AIL_set_3D_orientation, AIL_set_3D_position, AIL_set_3D_user_data, AIL_set_3D_velocity, AIL_set_3D_velocity_vector, AIL_update_3D_position
